reviewText: I like everything that he does. He has such a wonderful way of presenting the Bible and life.  Sometimes he makes everything seem so ideal.

Using this for a small group study at church along with his book of the same title. Great clips and good basis for discussion. Includes a small leader's guide and suggestions for structuring group time.
We enjoyed the study and looking at how we don't look at the nuances of life, faith, politics and reason.
